subscription.pause.title: Pause this subscription?
subscription.pause.text: By pausing, this subscription's items will no longer be ordered automatically. There are no extra fees and you can resume it anytime.
subscription.cancel.title: Cancel this subscription?
subscription.cancel.text: By canceling, this subscription's items will no longer be ordered automatically. There are no extra fees and this action cannot be undone.
subscription.restore.title: Restore this subscription?
subscription.restore.text: By resuming, this subscription's items will be ordered automatically again. You can cancel it again anytime, with no extra fees.
subscription.skip.title: Do you want to skip the next purchase of your subscription?
subscription.unskip.text: The next purchase of your subscription will be made and the following purchases will not be affected. You can change this setting until the order date.
subscription.unskip.title: Do you want to not skip the next purchase of your subscription?
subscription.skip.text: The next purchase of your subscription will not be made, but subsequent purchases will not be affected. You can change this setting until the order date.
subscription.view.title: Subscription with {value} products
subscription.notFound.title: You don't have subscriptions yet
subscription.notFound.text: Subscribe your favorite products and always find them here
subscription.name.editition.name.title: Choose a name to your subscription:
subscription.fallback.error.message: Something went wrong, try again later!
subscription.execution.again.description: This order won't interfere in your subscriptions next purchases and its dates.
subscription.execution.status.FAILURE: A problem has occurred while generating your order
subscription.execution.status.ORDER_ERRO: A problem has occurred while generating your order
subscription.execution.status.SUCCESS_WI: We tried to generate your order, but the products weren't in stock
We're able to generate your order, but one or more items weren't in stock
subscription.execution.status.RE_TRIGGER: After an unsuccessful attempt, we're trying to generate your order again
subscription.products.card.title: Subscribed Products
subscription.products.card.remove.error: An error occurred trying to remove this product, try again later.
subscription.products.card.remove.title: Remove this product?
subscription.products.card.remove.desc: If you remove it, it won't be ordered anymore on subscription.
subscription.batch.modal.desc: Would you like to apply this change for these other subscriptions as well?
add-item-modal.empty-message: Find your products and with one click add them to your subscription
add-item-modal.no-results-message: It seems that there is no product with this name
add-item-modal.title: Add new product
subscribe-button.frequency-not-available: This product can not be subscribed in this frequency
details-page.action-bar.label.orderDispa: Your order is already on the way
